name: Block bop
description:
Move quickly over platforms and through obstacles as they disappear beneath you. Spikes and lasers turn on and off to the beat, so you need to time your movements carefully. You can also collect orbs for extra points in hard to reach locations, if you think you have the time to risk it...

See how high you can climb in this fast paced platformer!

Background:
This is a small game project that took roughly 3 weeks to complete. I just wanted to try something that had procedural generation.
